amendment.description: To ensure that beneficiaries initially covered by a private insurer under this act who are subsequently covered by a Medicare fallback plan have the option of retaining a Medicare fallback plan.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 1110 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 1110 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S8632, S8687; text: CR S8632) To ensure that beneficiaries initially covered by a private insurer under this act who are subsequently covered by a Medicare fallback plan have the option of retaining a Medicare fallback plan.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1110 proposed by Senator Baucus for Senator Levin.
